      • writeCorrelation

        public boolean writeCorrelation(java.lang.String agency,
                                java.lang.String author,
                                java.util.GregorianCalendar correlationPickTime,
                                java.lang.String seedname,
                                int sequence,
                                double latitude,
                                double longitude,
                                double depth,
                                java.util.GregorianCalendar correlationOriginTime,
                                java.lang.String phase,
                                java.lang.String eventtype,
                                double corrleationvalue,
                                double magnitude,
                                double snr,
                                double zscore,
                                double detectionThreshold,
                                java.lang.String thresholdType)
        Write a pick to disk via this object. The return indicates whether the pick was written to disk.
        Parameters:
        agency - Character string with agency id
        author - Character string with author name
        correlationPickTime - The time of the correlation pick time
        seedname - NNSSSSSCCCLL for the channel being correlated
        sequence - Some sequence number for this this pick. This must be unique for each correlation.
        latitude - in degrees
        longitude - in degrees
        depth - in km
        phase - A phase code like "P" or "S" limit 8 characters
        correlationOriginTime - The time of the correlation pick time
        eventtype - earthquake or blast (null omit)
        correlationvalue - value representing the strength of the correlation
        magnitude - the relative magnitude of the correlation (<=0. omit);
        snr - Signal to noise ratio (<=0. omit);
        zscore - Z-Score of the detection (<=0. omit);
        detectionThreshold - The detection threshold (<=0. omit);
        thresholdType - How threshold was set (null omit);
        Returns:
        True if the correlation was written, otherwise the correlation was not written and user might want to resubmit later!
